product.title: Mini Unikko cotton
product.description: Cotton fabric in the Mini Unikko print in rich reds and plum.

product.title: Kuuskajaskari linen
product.description: One of the fabrics from our Sääpäiväkirja collection, Kuuskajaskari sighs with autumn winds and takes its colour palette from the same season.

product.title: Lumimarja cotton
product.description: Lumimarja, Erja Hirvi´s soulful 2004 design inspired by nature in winter, is fast becoming a Marimekko classic.

product.title: Unikko heavyweight cotton fabric
product.description: This heavyweight cotton fabric features the classic Unikko print in light blue and dark green, originally designed by Maija Isola.

product.title: Räsymatto heavyweight cotton
product.description: Made of heavyweight cotton, this Räsymatto print designed by Maija Louekari was inspired by traditional woven Finnish rugs. This version is in classic red and white.

product.title: Veljekset cotton
product.description: This cotton fabric features the new Veljekset print of the deep forest designed by Maija Louekari. This product was designed to celebrate the 100th anniversary of Finland's independence.

product.title: Vuorilaakso heavyweight cotton
product.description: The Vuorilaakso print on heavyweight cotton features stylized mountain ranges in deep reds designed by Sanna Annukka.

product.title: Isot Kivet heavyweight cotton
product.description: Maija Isola created the Kivet fabric in 1956 by cutting out rounds of coloured paper with scissors. .

product.title: Kurjenpolvi heavyweight cotton
product.description: Abundant Blossoms. Aino-Maija Metsola captures the exuberance of flowers in the Kurjenpolvi print’s large-scale line drawings.

product.title: Kaiku cotton
product.description: Maija Louekari´s fabrics exude a strong sense of place, space, and time. Kaiku, with its birches and traditional Finnish landscape, opens a window onto a new dimension.

product.title: Mehiläispesä cotton
product.description: Maija and Kristina Isola´s Mehiläispesä was conceived at a time when Maija Isola´s interest began to shift from lace-like ornamentation towards graphic,

product.title: Fokus heavyweight cotton
product.description: Anna Danielsson´s refined Fokus fabric is an elegant eye-catcher that works equally as well as a tablecloth, curtain, or work of wall art. In heavyweight cotton.

product.title: Basket heavyweight cotton
product.description: Made of Heavyweight cotton, this fabric features Carina Seth Andersson’s interwoven Basket print.

product.title: Puutarhurin parhaat heavyweight cotton
product.description: The fruits of the gardener´s labours look lovely on Puutarhurin parhaat, a Maija Louekari design.

product.title: Kulkue cotton
product.description: Maija Louekari´s exuberant Kulkue print speaks to friendship and the joys of companionship.

product.title: Jurmo heavyweight cotton
product.description: Nature’s Stonework. The serene yet austere landscape of the Finnish island Jurmo inspired Aino-Maija Metsola to design this beautiful print of the same name featuring layers of rocks and stones.

product.title: Lepo cotton
product.description: Designed by Fujiwo Ishimoto in 1991, our Lepo fabric is the artist's reminiscence of the soft grasses

product.title: Bottna cotton
product.description: Anna Danielsson´s Bottna design is a modern Marimekko classic, much appreciated by lovers of clean lines.

product.title: Kompotti -puuvilla
product.description: The pattern comes from a bush branch to which Hirvi added beautiful berries.

product.title: Puketti cotton
product.description: Annika Rimala designed the classic Puketti print in 1965 and it’s remained a classic. Puketti,

product.title: Pieni Unikko cotton
product.description: This classic was created in 1964, after Marimekko founder Armi Ratia publicly proclaimed a ban on flowers in Marimekko prints.

product.title: Vuorilaakso heavyweight cotton
product.description: The Vuorilaakso print on heavyweight cotton features stylized mountain ranges in grays designed by Sanna Annukka.

product.title: Räsymatto heavyweight cotton
product.description: The Räsymatto print runs across this heavyweight cotton in bright oranges, pinks, and dark grays.

product.title: Pikkupakkanen cotton fabric
product.description: This printed cotton fabric in shades of white, blue and red depicts a mild winter day

product.title: Unikko heavyweight cotton fabric
product.description: This heavyweight cotton fabric features the classic Unikko print in light blue and dark green
